    • Method Detail

      • doAnagram

        public void doAnagram()
        DoAnagram method finds matching word in the dictionary that is the anagram of the input string. print out all the matching words that are the reordering forms of the input string
        Parameters:
        anag - the input string

      • generateCandidates

        public void generateCandidates()
        Generate anagram candidates of a word and save in candidate[]

      • isCandidate

        private boolean isCandidate(Word w)
        Check if Word w is a candidate anagram for Word anag A candidate word is not necessarily a valid candidate word
        Parameters:
        w - a word in the dictionary
        Returns:
        true if Word w is a candidate anagram, return false otherwise

      • validLength

        private boolean validLength(Word w)
        Check if the Word w in the Dictionary has the valid length that enable it to form an anagram
        Parameters:
        target - the word that need to find an anagram
        w - the word parsed from the file
        Returns:
        true if the Word w has a valid length such that it's a candidate of the anagram of target.

      • isWord

        private boolean isWord(Word w)
        Check if Word w is a word greater than the minLength
        Parameters:
        w - the word parsed from the file
        Returns:
        true if Word w is a word

      • fewerOfEachLetter

        private boolean fewerOfEachLetter(Word w)
        Check if the Word w has fewer number of each letter than Word target
        Parameters:
        target - the word that needs to find an anagram
        w - the word parsed from the file
        Returns:
        true if Word w has fewer of each letter than the target Word target

      • printCandidate

        private void printCandidate()
        Print all the candidates of the input word

      • findAnagram

        private void findAnagram()
        FindAnagram calls the recursive helper method
        Parameters:
        anag - the anagram word
        RootEndIndex - the index of the candidate word that contains the leastCommonLetter

      • findAnagram

        private void findAnagram(int[] count,
                         java.lang.String[] wordArray,
                         int level,
                         int startAt,
                         int endAt)
        Find the anagram by recursive search
        Parameters:
        count - count of the number of letter from A-Z
        wordArray - WordArray stores the valid group of candidates for the anagram
        level - level keeps track of the search
        StartAt - start index in the candidate array
        endAt - end index in the candidate array

                               Word candidate)

        Parameters:
        anagram - the anagram
        candidate - the candidate word from the parsed file
        Returns:
        true if the word candidate is a valid candidate of word anag

        hithe - right index

                      int lo,
                      int leastCommonLetter)
        The partition function is a helper method for quickSort
        Parameters:

        lo - the low index
        leastCommonLetter - the least common letter among candidates
        Returns:

        Returns:
